name: PieceWars
description:
Make full use of the unique skills of each piece to win!

"Piece Wars" is a chess-based board game.
Here's how to play Piece Wars.
·Formation
Arrange the pieces to build a formation.
·Shop
Purchase pieces as needed.
·Battle
In the current version, you can play against enemy AI through story mode.
In the online battle mode scheduled to be released in the future.
You can enjoy casual matche and ranked match.
